message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $12,000, but that's as high as I can go.
